REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5193 reute r f BC-OWENS-CORNING-<OCF>-C 03-17 0049

TEXT.TITLE: OWENS-CORNING <OCF> COMPLETES SALE OF PLANTS
TEXT.BODY: Owens-Corning Fiberglas Corp said it has completed the previously-announced sale of its three foam products plants to Atlas Roofing Corp for undisclosed terms. The sale is part of its restructuring, the company said. Reuter
